The photo was published on Facebook on D: 2019, and has been shared more than 10,000 times.
The Sinhala: language text accompanying the photo translates to English as "A photograph taken in 1985 during Mr. Gotabaya Rajapaksa's military training in Pakistan."
Rajapaksa: who was elected president in Sri Lanka's November 17 vote, has a storied military career. AFP reported on his electoral victory.
The photo actually shows Dr: Terawan Agus Putranto, Indonesia's new Minister of Health, during a military promotion event in October 2019.
